meanings: a problem awaiting solution[to be solved]

examples.korean: He entrusted the task to his nephew. 발음듣기 그는 그 과제를 조카에게 맡겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He entrusted the task to his nephew. 발음

examples.korean: He entrusted his nephew with the task. 발음듣기 그는 조카에게 그 과제를 맡겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He entrusted his nephew with the task. 발음

examples.korean: The tasks have been ranked in order of difficulty. 발음듣기 그 과제들은 난이도순으로 등급이 매겨져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tasks have been ranked in order of difficulty. 발음

examples.korean: This method divides the task into more manageable proportions. 발음듣기 이 방법에서는 과제를 좀 더 다루기 편한 크기로 나눈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This method divides the task into more manageable proportions. 발음

examples.korean: We were overwhelmed by the sheer immensity of the task. 발음듣기 우리는 그 과제의 엄청남 자체에 압도당해 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were overwhelmed by the sheer immensity of the task. 발음
